Emin I'm seeing there is good
reason to hide these partitions! Thanks. Cal

metadata.topic: more recovery partition stuff - this is W11 specific
metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] more recovery partition stuff - this is W11 specific
metadata.email_text_original:
[You don't often get email from calvin@mcltech.ca. Learn why this is important
at https://aka.ms/LearnAboutSenderIdentification ] Emin I'm seeing there is good
reason to hide these partitions! Thanks. Cal -----Original Message----- From:
patchmanagement@googlegroups.com [mailto:patchmanagement@googlegroups.com] On
Behalf Of Emin Sent: January 24, 2024 3:27 AM To:
patchmanagement@googlegroups.com Subject: Re: [patchmanagement] more recovery
partition stuff - this is W11 specific Hi, You could also have a PBR (Push
Button Reset) partition at the end that is also a recovery partition.
https://can01.safelinks.protection.outlook.com/?url=https%3A%2F%2Flearn.microsoft.com%2Fen-us%2Fwindows-hardware%2Fmanufacture%2Fdesktop%2Fdeploy-windows-re%3Fview%3Dwindows-11%23prepare-a-diskpart-script-to-identify-the-recovery-partitions-and-to-hide-drive-letters&data=05%7C02%7Cemail_ingestion%40bighatgroup.com%7C09eb3e47f721477ce6e008dc1d1dff53%7C5a01497e1bcb4711b6e6d24f4ab00393%7C0%7C0%7C638417261883217249%7CUnknown%7CTWFpbGZsb3d8eyJWIjoiMC4wLjAwMDAiLCJQIjoiV2luMzIiLCJBTiI6Ik1haWwiLCJXVCI6Mn0%3D%7C3000%7C%7C%7C&sdata=XeKSvF2jrLNudzh3n3yOaOrY85CZEIsJONMkeaAPIeY%3D&reserved=0
On Wed, Jan 24, 2024 at 3:46 AM 'Ira Shapiro' via PatchManagement wrote: Cal- If
this is a Dell, that’s how they come from the factory. One Recovery partition is
Dell Support tools (probably the 1567MB one). The 990MB one is probably WinRe.
Hope that helps. Ira
Link: None
